name: gitdownloadazurerepos
description: Download your Git Code from Azure Repos

azuregit.settings.command1.description: Customize the commands that run after selecing a repo. The URL will get filled in where you have {{URL}}. Commands are run in the order: Command1, Command2, Command3

azuregit.settings.command2.description: Customize the commands that run after selecing a repo. The URL will get filled in where you have {{URL}}. Commands are run in the order: Command1, Command2, Command3

azuregit.settings.command3.description: Customize the commands that run after selecing a repo. The URL will get filled in where you have {{URL}}. Commands are run in the order: Command1, Command2, Command3

azuregit.settings.showStatusBar.description: Display Azure Git button on Status Bar

azuregit.settings.sortByLastCommit.description: Sort Repos by date of last commit
